description: This opportunity to investigate in-depth a topic of interest, typically culminating in a library research-based paper, is strongly recommended as preparation for Psychology 398. Prerequisite: Psychology 125, and at least three courses in the department and permission of instructor. Psychology 231 is strongly recommended. Offered each semester.
name: IS/Special Ed Policy
prerequisites: Prerequisite: Psychology 125, and at least three courses in the department and permission of instructor. Psychology 231 is strongly recommended. Offered each semester.
title: Independent Study
